name: GetMailchimpTemplateInfo
description:
Retrieves detailed information about a specific Mailchimp template.

Use this tool to obtain information about a particular template in Mailchimp by providing the template ID. It is useful for retrieving template details when managing email marketing campaigns.

parameters.name: template_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp template to retrieve information about.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the template.
